about_the_game:
On an ordinary, dull evening, when Skoof Cletus was comfortably settled in front of his TV in his humble apartment, a strange noise outside caught his attention. Looking out the window, he was shocked and horrified to see vicious lizards appearing out of nowhere on the streets of his backwater town, Kislodryshchensk. Without wasting a moment, Cletus quickly tucked his striped shirt into his pants, feeling a surge of patriotic spirit. Deep inside, he was ready to become a hero and protect his beloved Skoof land! Thus begins the great battle, in which you will take part!

Slay hordes of vicious lizards and save the Earth!
This is a casual arcade shooter with simplified roguelike elements. Every decision you make can trigger a chain reaction of consequences for the hordes of lizards you’ll face.

A survival game with minimalist gameplay and simplified roguelike elements. Your goal is to survive as long as possible. Collect unique items in each run to buy upgrades and help the next survivor.

Game Features:

  • Story campaign with 18 unique missions
  • 2 alternative game modes
  • Over 100 unique abilities and game mechanics
  • Modifiers that change the gameplay
  • Epic bosses

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent, AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3600+ (2 * 1910) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7300 GT (512 MB), Radeon X1300 Pro (256 MB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mac M1 officially not supported
